name: Plasma-Core
description:
You overslept... and now the facility is empty... save for what was being studied in there.

Embark on a journey to murder every glowing thing that comes your way, and collect useful equipment just as they evolve to counteract your previous stuff!

Made for the Go Godot Jam

Controls:

wasd - move
mouse - aim
left mouse button - shoot/use

Music used:

We Evolve (Instrumental) by Aviators
Catalyst (Instrumental) by Aviators
(You can find more work by Aviators at soundoftheaviators.bandcamp.com)
